FileImporterInterWikiMap.description: Manually maps host names to multi-hop interwiki prefixes. Deprecated.

FileImporterShowInputScreen.description: Whether or not to show the source URL input page.

FileImporterCommonsHelperServer.description: Location of CommonsHelper2-compatible configuration pages to use, e.g. "https://www.mediawiki.org". Set to an empty string to disable.

FileImporterWikidataEntityEndpoint.description: Location of Wikidata entity endpoint for fetching localized template names, e.g. "https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Special:EntityData/". Set to an empty string to disable.

FileImporterWikidataNowCommonsEntity.description: Entity ID of the NowCommons template, e.g. "Q5611625".

FileImporterCommonsHelperBasePageName.description: Base page name of CommonsHelper2-compatible configuration pages to use.

FileImporterCommonsHelperHelpPage.description: Location of the help page for the CommonsHelper2-compatible configuration page management.

FileImporterCommentForPostImportRevision.description: Text used for the edit summary of a post import revision.

FileImporterTextForPostImportRevision.value: <!--This file was moved here using FileImporter from $1-->
FileImporterTextForPostImportRevision.description: Text to add to the imported page's wikitext.

FileImporterMaxRevisions.description: Maximum number of revisions (file or text) a file can have in order to be imported.

FileImporterMaxAggregatedBytes.description: Maximum aggregated size of versions a file can have in order to be imported.

FileImporterSourceWikiDeletion.description: When set to true, FileImporter offers an option to automatically delete the source file after a successful import. Requires the CentralAuth extension to be set up and running on both the source and target wiki.

FileImporterSourceWikiTemplating.description: When set to true, FileImporter offers an option to automatically edit the source file after a successful import. Requires the CentralAuth extension to be set up and running on both the source and target wiki.
